DOC.brief_summary: Based on PET (18-PSS232) and MRI, glutamate release after N-acetylcystein challenge will be monitored in human brains.
DOC.brief_title: PET/MRI Imaging of Glutamate Release in the Brain
DOC.detailed_description: Diagnostic trial with quantification of glutamate release in PET/MR.
DOC.criteria: healthy volunteer smoker drug addiction significant neurological or psychiatric conditions
